name: Rubber Ducky
author: Huitzo Team
tagline: Talk through problems and find your own solutions
description: Ever solved a problem just by explaining it to someone? That's the power of rubber duck debugging. Use the CLI to chat with an AI that asks thoughtful questions instead of giving answers, helping you think deeper and find solutions you might have missed.
features: Chat with an AI designed to listen and ask questions
No direct answers - AI helps you think it through
Works for coding problems, work challenges, or life decisions
Guided questioning helps reveal the real issue
